name: Evelyn 'Eve' Sparks
dialogue_tone: Her tone is lively and engaging, often speaking quickly with a playful lilt. It's filled with enthusiasm and curiosity, changing unpredictably, mirroring her erratic nature.

personality_traits.description: Brimming with energy and exudes a positive aura.
Tends to change her tone unpredictably and talks to herself when deep in thought.
Incredibly organized, which aids in her engineering work.

living_conditions: Lives a structured life in a small, cozy apartment with a dedicated workspace for her projects.
Maintains an excellent work-life balance with a focus on her goals of creating mechanical devices.
Engages in a daily routine involving morning exercises and evening brainstorming sessions.
